overview: It’s a question that’s been concentrating the minds of philosophers for eons: Who’s best? Chavs or Skaters? Well, now’s the time for you to make up your own mind, as a collection of hard-nosed (not to mention hard-cocked!) Chavs hit upon a series of board-obsessed Skaterboys for a series of jizz-soaked encounters that’ll have you tugging on your joystick time and time again. Classic Brit porn – whichever side of the youth divide you happen to fall!
title: Chavs vs. Skaters
